title: Dark Envoy Combines Sci-fi and Fantasy in A New More Accessible Co-op CRPG | Interview
description:
Dark Envoy is the new game in development at studio Event Horizon, creators of Tower of Time. Nick recently sat down with Krzysztof Monkiewicz, founder of Event Horizon, to learn more about this interesting looking new cooperative CRPG that combines sci-fi and fantasy.
